QuestData.Title: Decimation
QuestData.Description: <Melisara's image appears before you.>$B$BThe Stormpike forward camp sits atop Corrahn's Dagger, west of Sofera's Naze. You must enter the camp and slaughter every dwarf that you see. They must be taught what it means to fear and there is no finer lesson than absolute decimation.$B$BNo survivors, $n. Even their captain - especially their captain - must die.$B$BI will be in contact.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: The Stormpike will learn what it means to fear.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Captain Iceheart and 12 Stormpike Soldiers.
QuestData.RewardText: <Melisara's voice pervades your thoughts.>$B$BThey will see the bloodshed and they will hesitate. Hesitation will make them think twice about ever attacking us again.
